import React, { useState } from 'react' import ReactHtmlParser from 'react-html-parser' import Slider from "react-slick" import Link from "next/link" import Config from "../config" const ServiceListItem = (props) => { const img = props.data.img_preview.length>2 ? JSON.parse(props.data.img_preview)[0] : '' return (
{img.length>0 && ( )}

{props.data.title}

{props.data.description}

Solicitar servicio
) } export default ServiceListItem
